description: React component for Employee Dashboard including timesheet, status, calendar, timer, and leave management, with external service integrations and local state management.

classes.name: StatusBadge
classes.description: Component displaying status label with styled badge

methods.name: formatHMS
methods.description: Formats seconds into hh:mm:ss string

methods.name: recalcTodayTotal
methods.description: Recalculates total seconds for the selected day

methods.name: toISO
methods.description: Converts Date object to ISO date string (yyyy-mm-dd)

methods.name: formatDateReadable
methods.description: Converts ISO date string to human-readable format

methods.name: getStartOfWeek
methods.description: Calculates start of week (Monday) for a given date

methods.name: weekDaysFrom
methods.description: Generates array of Date objects for a week starting from given date

methods.name: getMonthGrid
methods.description: Generates array of Date objects for calendar month grid

methods.name: onClickDay
methods.description: Handles day cell click to select date

methods.name: onClickToday
methods.description: Sets selected date to today

methods.name: handleLogout
methods.description: Signs out the user

methods.name: onDateChange
methods.description: Handles change of date input

methods.name: validateHours
methods.description: Validates hours input for work entry

methods.name: onHoursChange
methods.description: Handles change in hours input

methods.name: clearFormOnly
methods.description: Resets form fields for work and leave entries

methods.name: onClear
methods.description: Clears form and resets editing state

methods.name: onClosePanel
methods.description: Closes/hides the new entry panel

methods.name: onSaveDraft
methods.description: Saves current form as draft (local only)

methods.name: onSubmitWork
methods.description: Submits or updates a work time entry with optimistic UI

methods.name: validateLeave
methods.description: Validates leave request form fields

methods.name: onSubmitLeave
methods.description: Submits leave request (frontend only)

methods.name: canEditOrDelete
methods.description: Determines if a log can be edited or deleted based on status

methods.name: handleEditWork
methods.description: Prepares form for editing a work log

methods.name: handleDeleteWork
methods.description: Deletes a work log with optimistic UI

methods.name: handleEditLeave
methods.description: Prepares form for editing a leave request

methods.name: handleDeleteLeave
methods.description: Deletes a leave request
